raw_body:
DAVID – BRIDGET – Beloved wife of (late) Douglas David,​ loving mother of Tyronne and mother-in-law of Dianne (Australia),​ loving aunt of Ian De Mello (Canada),​ loving sister of (late) Edward,​ (late) Walter,​ (late) Marcus,​ (late) Christopher,​ (late) Mrs. Gertrude Perera and Mrs. Ethel Karunaratne. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour from
9 a.m. on Monday 13th May. Cortege leaves A.F. Raymond’s Parlour on Tuesday 14th May at 10.00 a.m. for burial at the General Cemetery,​ Borella (R.C. Section).           031993
